page.title: 20Softball, Kesgrave
page.content: Softball is a game similar to rounders. You have two teams equal in number, one team is the batting team and the other team field. The idea of the game is to hit a ball with the bat and run round a square of four bases. If you get round in one go you get two points. You can have three goes at hitting the ball and if you miss on the third go you may run to first base as long as nobody is on it. If you are touched with the ball while between bases, or stumped, or caught then you are out. Five people out means you change over and field instead of bat or bat instead of field. We play this game at school. The bat is much longer than a rounders bat and you use a large very {hard} ball even though the game is called {soft} ball.
